reviews.comment:
Truly 5-star service from start to finish!
I visited Cocoon Medical Spa in Canggu for their detox package and had the most incredible experience. From the moment I walked in, the team made me feel comfortable, relaxed, and totally taken care of.

The package included a colon cleanse, a beautiful Balinese massage, and a session in the red light therapy bed (can‚Äôt remember the exact name, but it was amazing). As a lovely surprise, I was also given a complimentary collagen mask, which left my skin feeling so fresh and glowing!

A special thank you to Tini and Nurse Dita ‚Äì they were both so kind, professional, and attentive. Nurse Dita even offered me helpful aftercare advice and some great tips to support my diet and overall wellness in everyday life.

I walked out feeling lighter, calmer, and absolutely pampered. Highly recommend Cocoon to anyone looking for a holistic, healing, and luxurious experience. I‚Äôll definitely be back!

reviewReply.comment:
Hi Aimee,
Thank you so much for this beautiful review! We‚Äôre so happy to hear that you had such a positive and pampering experience with our detox package. It means a lot to know that you felt cared for from start to finish, that‚Äôs exactly what we aim for.

Tini and Nurse Dita will be thrilled to hear your kind words. We‚Äôre also glad the treatments (including the amethyst PEMF Biomat therapy and collagen mask!) left you feeling lighter, calmer, and glowing.

We can‚Äôt wait to welcome you back for more wellness and relaxation. Until then, take care and keep shining!
Warm regards,
Cocoon Canggu Team
